titles.title: Many a time I despaired for the end

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Many a time I despaired for the end
To the broken hearts crying around me; and then,
Weary, yet moving, but wondering when
I'll touch them and all their hearts mend.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
No more sorrow, no more wondering.
Touch them, touch those
Hearts that long to be free.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Though many times I just couldn't go on,
I'd look for an answer to tell me I'm strong.
Heal all my heartaches, don't leave them alone,
Just touch them and call them Your own.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
The world is out looking for what I have here:
A treasure, unmeasured, I must draw them near.
Silence is ending, the end of all fear,
So touch them and cry till they hear.
